channel.title: Adding donator crown to donators?
channel.description:
Okay so i've downloaded a client(bluurrs) where it already has a donator crown, all set up. My problem is I'm not sure how to add it to donators, if it helps I make people donators using [code]character-donator = 1[/code]
thanks.

item.title: Adding donator crown to donators?
item.dc:creator: @SnowBlind SnowBlind
item.description:
@SnowBlind wrote:

Wow?..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 07:48:15 am[/size][hr]Okay… if you honestly didn’t understand whatI just said. Because the donators symbols are customs, I have setone up and it’s there, in my client. However, I’m not sure what I need to change SOURCE side to make it so donators actually have the symbol next to their name.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 07:57:16 am[/size][hr]No one?

Read full topic
